column3: utACK c0f9a61793ffccb6af97ffb6b4a156780e1a4597\n\nAfter this it seems that `GetScriptForWitness` is only used in `bitcoin-tx` (all in places were more explicit constructions of scripts would be preferable) and in tests. Maybe it's time (in a different PR) to get rid of it entirely.
